name: Noire (Jake Stafford Music, Swordslinger, Nayboh_Music, Jess, amodelkit, nynomastro, Zoomity, kei, Jay, Mato, parsnip)
name_original: Noire (Jake Stafford Music, Swordslinger, Nayboh_Music, Jess, amodelkit, nynomastro, Zoomity, kei, Jay, Mato, parsnip)
description:
NOIRE

In an abandoned city, corrupted by an unknown beast, fight your way through the the shattered ruins of LC as you try to discover the truth of what happened, and who you truly are.

==============================

Updates and bug fixes coming!

NOIRE is a 2d metroidvania set in a mysterious laboratory, explore the labyrinthian corridors of LC and discover the truth behind the devastation.

Controls:

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: Space

Stab:  J

Pause: Esc

and more!

==============================

v1.025 - More bugfixes for softlocking

v1.023 - Bugfix for softlocking

v1.01 - Initial Upload
